import React, { Component } from 'react' import {ProductConsumer} from '../context' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {ButtonContainer} from './Button' import axios from 'axios' import { values } from 'mobx' import PayPalButton from '../components/Favourites/PayPalButton' export default class extends Component { state = { offer: [], car: []} componentDidMount = () => { //const id = this.props.location.state const id = this.props.location.state.id console.log(id) const link2 = 'http://localhost:8080/offers/' + id; axios.get(link2,{ headers : { 'language':'pl' } }) .then( (response) => { console.log(response.data) this.setState({ offer: response.data }) const link = 'http://localhost:8080/cars/' + this.state.offer.carID; console.log(link) axios.get(link,{ headers : { 'language':'pl' } }) .then( (response) => { console.log(response.data) this.setState({ car: response.data }) }) }) } render() { return (

{this.state.offer.title}

{/*
*/}

{this.state.car.carBrand} {this.state.car.carModel}

Nazwa: {this.state.car.carName}

Paliwo: {this.state.car.fuel}

Kolor: {this.state.car.color}

Silnik: {this.state.car.engine}

Moc: {this.state.car.enginePower}

Skrzyna biegow: {this.state.car.gearBox}

Kraj pochodzenia: {this.state.offer.country}

Numer telefonu: {this.state.offer.phone}

Email: {this.state.offer.email}

Cena: {this.state.car.price}zł/dzień

Informacje od właściciela:

{this.state.offer.description}

Powrót
decrement(id)}> - {count1} increment(id)}> +
{(value) => ( { value.addToFavourite(this.state.car,this.state.offer.id); value.openModal(this.state.car); }}> {this.state.car.inFavourites?"Polubiono":"Dodaj do polubionych"} )}
) } }
